desc: Getting down to a healthy weight is a hard, frustrating and usually a short-lived experience. Maintaining that healthy weight can be even more difficult. Individuals who want to be successful want effective, reliable, medically sound and clinically proven products.

layout.text: Effective, Reliable, Medically Tested, Slenderizing Formula
AttenuSlim was developed by a team of board-certified physicians to help your gain control of you weight.
